channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- weForms – Easy Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder For WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- weForms – Easy Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder For WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-2395|2024-08-03T00:39:06.395Z -- unknown -- weforms%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The weForms WordPress plugin before 1.6.14 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
